title: team looking for a gold - platin top main
body:
Heyho we are a new found team and currently looking for an Gold - Platin Top lane main.
we use TS3 atm so make sure to have that ready :)
!!!no negative thoughts!!!
don't troll
try your best
add me ingame if you are interested -> xXDelokXx
-> we are playing in the evening ( most times to practice ) and try to play in tournaments or just R5V5 at the weekend.
team: unknown wolves
so be ready to howl ;D
we prefer guys from germany or the UK :)
